title: Lead Capture Form Submission with Valid Data
description: Verify that the public website lead capture form accepts valid input, saves lead data correctly, triggers instant lead response email, and creates a lead entry in the pipeline.

steps.description: Navigate to public lead capture website form at /request-inspection
Fill in all mandatory fields with valid Australian-standard data (phone, postcode, ABN, date)
Submit the form
Check form submission returns success response and data is stored in database
Verify lead appears in the 12-stage pipeline with initial status
Confirm instant automated email response is sent to customer with correct template and variables

title: Lead Capture Form Validation for Invalid Input
description: Ensure lead capture form enforces validation rules for required fields and Australian-standard formatting, preventing submission with invalid data.

steps.description: Navigate to public lead capture website form
Enter invalid phone number, postcode, and ABN formats
Leave mandatory fields empty
Attempt to submit the form
Verify client-side validation messages are shown for each invalid or missing field
Confirm form is not submitted and no lead entry is created

title: HiPages Integration Populates Leads into Pipeline
description: Verify that leads imported via HiPages integration are correctly populated into the 12-stage pipeline and appear in real-time Kanban board.

steps.description: Trigger lead import from HiPages test environment with sample lead data
Check imported leads appear in correct pipeline stage on /leads page
Verify lead details match data from HiPages
Ensure Kanban board updates in real-time reflecting new leads

title: Pipeline Drag-and-Drop Stage Change
description: Test that dragging and dropping leads between the 12 pipeline stages updates lead status correctly and triggers any stage-specific actions or notifications.

steps.description: Navigate to /leads pipeline Kanban board
Drag a lead card from one stage to another
Confirm lead status updates to new stage in UI and backend
Validate that any stage-related automated emails or notifications are triggered
Check lead counts are correctly updated on each stage

title: Offline Capable Inspection Form - Auto-Save Feature
description: Verify that inspection forms auto-save entered data every 30 seconds to localStorage and persist data if app goes offline or browser is closed unexpectedly.

steps.description: Start a new inspection from /inspection/new on a mobile device
Fill in multiple inspection fields, including environmental data and uploading photos
Wait 30 seconds and confirm auto-save triggers in background
Simulate loss of network connectivity (go offline)
Close and reopen app or browser
Check previously entered form data and photos are restored from localStorage
Reconnect network and submit inspection form
Verify data is saved to server database without loss

title: Inspection Form Photo Upload Handling
description: Validate the photo upload feature works in both online and offline modes, correctly storing and uploading photos upon reconnection.

steps.description: On mobile, start an inspection form and capture/upload photos via the form
Test photo uploads under strong network conditions
Confirm photos are attached and visible in the form preview
Simulate offline mode
Upload additional photos
Verify photos are stored locally
Go back online
Ensure local photos are uploaded to Supabase storage and linked to form data

title: AI-Generated Inspection Summary Creation
description: Verify AI-assisted summary generation works correctly after inspection data is completed and photos uploaded, producing an accurate and relevant summary text.

steps.description: Complete an inspection form with sample data and photos
Trigger AI summary generation process
Verify AI summary is generated within expected time limits
Confirm summary content relevance to input data and clarity
Edit generated summary and save changes
Check that edits persist and are reflected in report generation

title: PDF Report Generation from Dynamic HTML Templates
description: Validate automated PDF report generation matches dynamic HTML templates including photos, pricing, GST calculations, and formatting compliant with Australian standards.

steps.description: Submit completed inspection form with AI summary and photos
Trigger PDF report generation workflow
Verify generated PDF matches expected layout and includes all dynamic data
Confirm currency formatting uses Australian dollar style with commas and decimals
Check photo images are correctly embedded with proper sizing
Validate GST of 10% is applied on subtotal
Confirm pricing discount caps and multi-day discount rules are correctly applied in PDF

title: PDF Report Approval Workflow
description: Test the full approval workflow for PDF reports including preview, edit, regenerate, finalize, and email delivery with locked file post-approval.

steps.description: Open a generated PDF report in /reports
Edit the AI summary text in report preview
Regenerate PDF with edits applied
Approve/finalize the PDF report
Check PDF file is locked and cannot be edited post-approval
Verify approved PDF is stored on Supabase Storage correctly
Confirm customer email with PDF attachment is sent automatically

title: Customer Self-Service Booking Calendar - Multi-day Job Booking
description: Verify customers can book remediation jobs spanning multiple consecutive days, with correct date selection, pricing discounts, and booking updates lead status and notifications.

steps.description: Access customer booking calendar at /customer-booking
Select consecutive days exceeding 8 hours total job duration
Ensure multi-day discount pricing is applied correctly
Check booking conflict prevention is active, preventing double bookings
Submit the booking
Verify lead status updates appropriately in pipeline
Confirm email notifications for booking confirmation and reminders are sent

title: Booking Calendar Travel Time Conflict Prevention
description: Test that intelligent travel time calculation prevents customers from booking times that conflict with technician availability and existing jobs.

steps.description: Attempt to book remediation job with conflicting travel time to an existing booking
Check that calendar prevents selection of slots that would cause technician travel conflicts
Verify user is shown informative message explaining conflict

title: Automated Email Sending for All 8 Templates
description: Ensure the platform sends all 8 defined email templates (lead response, booking confirmations, reminders, report delivery, etc.) using Resend API with correct variable substitution and no deliverability issues.

steps.description: Trigger each email template through corresponding user action or workflow step (e.g. new lead, booking confirmation, reminder, report send)
Validate email content renders correct personalized variables
Confirm each email is dispatched via Resend API and received without spam flags
Verify attachments (PDF reports) are correctly included where applicable

title: Mobile Progressive Web App Performance and Usability
description: Test mobile app on iOS and Android devices to ensure load times are under 3 seconds on 4G, touch targets meet minimum 48px for glove use, and offline form submissions are usable.

steps.description: Access the app on multiple iOS and Android devices over 4G network
Measure and confirm page load times are under 3 seconds
Verify all buttons and form fields have touch targets â‰¥48px
Fill and submit inspection form offline
Check offline submission stores data locally and uploads on reconnect

title: Compliance with Australian Data Standards
description: Verify all data inputs and displayed content comply with Australian formatting standards for currency, phone numbers, dates, timezones, spelling, and ABN formats across the platform.

steps.description: Enter sample contact details including Australian formatted phone numbers ((03) XXXX XXXX and 04XX XXX XXX)
Check phone numbers display and validate correctly
Verify all currency values are shown as $X,XXX.XX with commas and decimals
Confirm GST calculations display on invoices and reports correctly
Check date inputs and displays use DD/MM/YYYY format and Australia/Melbourne timezone
Verify spelling uses Australian English throughout the UI and emails
Validate ABN input format matches XX XXX XXX XXX

title: Dashboard Real-time Pipeline and Revenue Tracking Updates
description: Validate that dashboard and analytics page provide real-time updates to pipeline status, lead counts, notifications, activity timeline, and revenue figures.

steps.description: Navigate to /dashboard and /analytics pages
Perform lead stage changes and booking activities in other sessions
Observe real-time updates in pipeline overview and lead counts on dashboard
Verify revenue figures reflect job bookings and discounts accurately
Check recent activity timeline and notifications show latest events

title: Settings Management Persistence and Validation
description: Test that all settings including pricing, company profile, equipment/material rates, operating hours, and notifications can be edited, validated, saved persistently, and reflected application-wide.

steps.description: Access /settings page
Modify pricing values, company profile info, equipment rates
Test validation errors for invalid pricing or missing required info
Save valid changes
Verify settings changes persist across sessions and reload
Confirm pricing updates affect relevant calculations in inspection reports and quotes

title: Demo Environment Load with Sample Data and Performance Check
description: Verify that the demo environment loads successfully with sample data, demonstrating end-to-end workflows with no errors and performs within required benchmarks.

steps.description: Initialize demo environment with sample leads, inspections, bookings, reports
Navigate through key user flows: lead management, inspection form, PDF reports, booking calendar, dashboard
Ensure no application errors or warnings appear
Confirm page loads and interactions meet benchmark performance criteria
